argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | lincresunit.b | |- B = ( Base ` M ) |
| 2 |  | lincresunit.r | |- R = ( Scalar ` M ) |
| 3 |  | lincresunit.e | |- E = ( Base ` R ) |
| 4 |  | lincresunit.u | |- U = ( Unit ` R ) |
| 5 |  | lincresunit.0 | |- .0. = ( 0g ` R ) |
| 6 |  | lincresunit.z | |- Z = ( 0g ` M ) |
| 7 |  | lincresunit.n | |- N = ( invg ` R ) |
| 8 |  | lincresunit.i | |- I = ( invr ` R ) |
| 9 |  | lincresunit.t | |- .x. = ( .r ` R ) |
| 10 |  | lincresunit.g | |- G = ( s e. ( S \ { X } ) |-> ( ( I ` ( N ` ( F ` X ) ) ) .x. ( F ` s ) ) ) |
| 11 | 2 | #P_lmodring | |- ( M e. LMod -> R e. Ring ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_3ad2ant2 | |- ( ( S e. ~P B /\ M e. LMod /\ X e. S ) -> R e. Ring ) |
| 13 | 12 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( ( S e. ~P B /\ M e. LMod /\ X e. S ) /\ ( F e. ( E ^m S ) /\ ( F ` X ) e. U ) ) -> R e. Ring ) |
| 14 |  | #P_simpr | |- ( ( F e. ( E ^m S ) /\ ( F ` X ) e. U ) -> ( F ` X ) e. U ) |
| 15 | 4, 7 | #P_unitnegcl | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ ( F ` X ) e. U ) -> ( N ` ( F ` X ) ) e. U ) |
| 16 | 12, 14, 15 | #P_syl2an | |- ( ( ( S e. ~P B /\ M e. LMod /\ X e. S ) /\ ( F e. ( E ^m S ) /\ ( F ` X ) e. U ) ) -> ( N ` ( F ` X ) ) e. U ) |
| 17 | 4, 8, 3 | #P_ringinvcl | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ ( N ` ( F ` X ) ) e. U ) -> ( I ` ( N ` ( F ` X ) ) ) e. E ) |
| 18 | 13, 16, 17 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ( ( S e. ~P B /\ M e. LMod /\ X e. S ) /\ ( F e. ( E ^m S ) /\ ( F ` X ) e. U ) ) -> ( I ` ( N ` ( F ` X ) ) ) e. E ) |
